By Rudie ObiasMashable Deals2019-03-04 18:19:58 UTC

Take the party with you with the Sony XB7 Extra Bass Bluetooth Audio Speaker System, which is now on sale for $199.99 at Best Buy. The retailer knocked $150 off its list price, so you're more than half way to picking up another speaker with the money you saved. 

Sony's high-power home audio speaker system connects to your smartphone or laptop via Bluetooth and features deep and rich audio with hard-hitting and thumping bass. The XB7 enhances your music and adds a little bit of flair with the speaker's built-in LED lights and multicolor patterns that sync to the rhythm of the beat.

SEE ALSO: The Hear app makes trippy sounds, but it probably won't help you concentrate

This speaker can really fill up a room with music, while it can be set up laying down horizontally like a boombox or standing up vertically like a DJ's setup. Either way you set it up, the audio comes out in full stereo to take advantage of its three tweeters and two woofers inside of its one-box construction.

Since the speaker system is Bluetooth enabled, you can daisy chain two or more speakers to each other with Sony's Party Chain feature. You still get the speaker's great audio and bass, but just more of it to keep the party going. 

In addition, Sony's XB7 has analog audio and USB inputs, so you can hook it up to a TV or plug it into a laptop directly for the ultimate home entertainment setup.

Best Buy customer tommytunes writes:

"Everything about this System is heavy duty, from the exterior to the way it sounds, it has a bass boost feature that you really don't have to use because there's enough for normal listening, the Bluetooth connects right away."
